title: Papers: Newcastle bid £33.5m for Guimaraes
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Wednesday's national newspapers...

title: Live on Sky: West Brom vs Preston
shortDescription: Watch West Brom vs Preston live on Sky Sports Football Red Button from 7.55pm on Wednesday; Kick off 8pm.

title: Papa John's Trophy: Arsenal U21 crash out; Wigan, Rotherham advance
shortDescription: Sky Bet League One leaders Wigan continued their fine form as they advanced to the semi-finals of the Papa John's Trophy with a 1-0 win at the DW Stadium on Tuesday.

title: Papa John's Trophy: The state of play
shortDescription: As the 2021/22 Papa John's Trophy reaches its latter stages, we bring you the state of play, upcoming fixtures and the schedule for the remainder of the tournament.

title: Newcastle giving up hope on Lingard | Carlos holding out for deal
shortDescription: Newcastle United have all but given up hope of signing Jesse Lingard on loan from Manchester United.

title: Ronan strike sees St Mirren past Aberdeen
shortDescription: Connor Ronan's second-half strike moved St Mirren three points behind opponents Aberdeen, beating the Dons 1-0 in the Scottish Premiership on Tuesday.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: QPR held; Forest, Coventry win
shortDescription: QPR missed the chance to move up to third in the Sky Bet Championship after they were held to a goalless draw at home by Swansea.

title: Sevilla sign Martial on loan from Man Utd
shortDescription: Sevilla have completed the signing of Anthony Martial on loan from Manchester United.

title: Luton see off Bristol City
shortDescription: Top scorer Elijah Adebayo was Luton's matchwinner as his 12th goal of the season earned his side a 2-1 home win against Bristol City.

title: Birmingham battle back for late draw
shortDescription: Peterborough were unable to change their away fortunes as two late goals for Birmingham forced a 2-2 draw at St Andrew's.

title: Gyokeres steers Coventry past Stoke
shortDescription: Viktor Gyokeres scored for the first time since early October as he hit the winner in Coventry's 1-0 victory at home to Stoke.

title: QPR and Swansea battle for draw
shortDescription: QPR were unable to extend their winning run as they were held to a drab goalless home draw by Swansea.

title: Forest cruise past Barnsley
shortDescription: Nottingham Forest rattled off a fourth straight win to see off bottom-of-the-table Barnsley 3-0 in the Sky Bet Championship.

title: Wednesday at AFCON: Could Salah & Egypt be knocked out?
shortDescription: Dates, kick-off times and host cities - here's the full schedule for AFCON 2021.

title: Hakimi completes Morocco comeback to reach AFCON quarters
shortDescription: Achraf Hakimi curled in a long-range free-kick as Morocco came from behind to beat Malawi 2-1 in the last 16 of the Africa Cup of Nations on Tuesday.

title: Man Utd, Liverpool, Chelsea & Man City in race for 15-year-old Endrick
shortDescription: Manchester United, Liverpool, Chelsea and Manchester City will try to sign Endrick when he turns 16 in July.

title: Watford appoint Hodgson as manager until end of season
shortDescription: Watford have appointed former England boss Roy Hodgson as their new manager on a deal until the end of the season.

title: Senegal 2-0 Cape Verde
shortDescription: Highlights of the Africa Cup of Nations match between Senegal and Cape Verde.

title: Rashford condemns antisemitism after being pictured with Wiley
shortDescription: Marcus Rashford has said he "does not condone" antisemitism after being pictured with the rapper Wiley, with Jesse Lingard also reinforcing his opposition to racism.

title: Mane suffers head injury, scores, then taken to hospital after Senegal win
shortDescription: Sadio Mane suffered a head injury then scored to help send Senegal to the AFCON quarter-finals, but was then substituted and taken to hospital.
